Property.description: The row title.
The field layout.
The border definition.
The expansion.
The attribute to manage the container.
The background color. A possible color for {@link ColorConstants} or a RGB value like: '150;230;23'.
The height in pixels for component. Used in empty rows.
The width in pixels for component. Used in empty rows.
The path for a background image.
The opaque condition for row.
The margin value for component.
The horizontal alignment. This parameter is only used if the layout value is 'flow'.
Path to source icon to extract a image and create a TexturePaint.
The attribute to manage the field.
The required condition.
The resize posibilities (no resize, resize the insertion space, resize the space between label and text).
The size of text in number of characters.
The alignment for field.
The visibility condition.
The font size.
The background color. A possible color for {@link ColorConstants} or a RGB value like: '150;230;23'.
The font color.
The label size in number of characters.
The label visibility.
The alignment for the text.
The alignment for the label.
The out border type.
The border type. They are allowed line borders with color defined in ColorConstants and borders registered in BorderManager.
The label position.
Alternative for attr text.
The tooltip for field.
The font color for label in field. By default, 'black'.
Font for data field. It is accepted a string like : 'Arial-BOLD-18'. Similar to Font.decode
Data field opacity condition.
The type of font for label of data field.
The border requirement condition. If it is specified to 'yes', it will be fixed to BorderManager.DEFAULT_DATA_FIELD_REQUIRED_BORDER.
The complete class name that implements FocusListener and will be registered like listener for this field.
The minimum number of integer digits.
The maximum number of integer digits.
The minimum number of decimal digits.
The maximum number of decimal digits.
The title for component. It must be unique in the form.
The border for container.
Indicates the horizontal expansion.
The attribute.
The background color. A possible color for {@link ColorConstants} or a RGB value like: '150;230;23'.
The preferred column height in pixels. Useful for specifying empty columns.
The preferred column width in pixels. Useful for specifying empty columns.
The background image.
Indicates whether column is opaque.
The margin value for component.
Indicates the vertical alignment.
Indicates wheter the component placed in the bottom of column will be expanded and take up all remaining column space.
Path to source icon to extract a image and create a TexturePaint.
The title for component. It must be unique in the form. Only required when attr is not specified.
The icon panel.
Indicates the component attribute. Only required when title is not specified.
Specifies when data tab are queried. Only when is visible or in normal query mode.
Specifies the tip for tab.
Establishes if the data navigation buttons are visible.
Name of the entity related to the Form
List of names of the entity primary key.
List of foreing key column names.
Establishes if the form can be printed.
Establishes if the form has a status bar.
If this parameter exists the help button is displayed into the form. The parameter value is used as key for searching the resource text.
Establishes the list of attributes that are showed in the table view.
Resources file name that this form going to use.
Establishes if the form body will show the scrollbars when the components don't have enough space

The form doesn't guarantee the order in which the fields will be filled. If a field value is required by another one (as a parentKey of a ReferenceDataField), an error could be produced. In principle, the default filler should be right in most cases, but with this parameter the filler order can be established. It isn't necessary to establish every field attribute. The attributes specified in this parameter are filled first. No es necesario especificar todos los atributos de los campos, los que se especifiquen se les rellenara de primeros
Establishes if the custom focus traversal policy is used
Establishes the value of the form title that is displayed in the top of the form
This parameter allows to hide the attachment button when attachments are implemented in the application.
Establishes help key uses for identify the help section dedicates a form.
When a query with multiple results is done the table view with all results is showed if this parameter is established a true.
Establishes if the table view has a horizontal scroll.
Establishes the file name of template used to print the form data.
This parameter allows to hide the template printing button when templates are implemented in the application,
Path to this form icon.
Path to this form icon
Path to this form icon
Path to this form icon
Path to this form icon
Path to this form icon
Path to this form icon
Path to this form icon
default/none/raised/lowered or a color defined in ColorConstants. Moreover, it is also allowed a border defined in BorderManager
Data field opacity condition for Form buttons
Font for result count label that show the number of records in Form. A string like :'Arial-BOLD-18'
Data field opacity condition for Form buttons
Color for button panel.
Sets the highlight in button property when mouse is entered. See AbstractButton-setContentAreaFilled(boolean)). This parameter requires opaque='no'
Font for status bar (title of form)
Border for status (title of form).
Keys for buttons and status. Allow to define the both Form buttons and status(title) order. I.e. button1;button2;status;...;button3;...;buttonn
The minimum row height for each row in table that is showed when user presses twice to Query Button.
The background image
Name of associated entity.
Keys referred to the form entity. Separated by ';'. It must match up with the tree keys when they exist.
attr of the field where is stored the XML Form and which will be used for the transformations.
The text that will appear in the border of the HTML Field.
Name of associated entity.
The text that will appear in the component.
List of the XSL files (package.filename1.xsl;package.filename2.xsl;...) that can be used form transform the XML File.
List of parameters=values that will be applied to all XSL transformations(param1=value1;param2=value2;...).
Name of the class that will be used as a HTML Viewer.
Name of the css file that will used by the viewer.
Name of the pattern file that will used by the viewer.
Indicates wheter the component placed in the bottom of column will be expanded and take up all remaining column space.
The title for component. It must be unique in the form. Only required when attr is not specified.
Changes the order when the icons are shown.
The icon panel.
Indicates the component attribute. Only required when title is not specified.
The border for container.
Border class used to create the border for container. See javadoc
Specifies whether panel is showed or hidden on startup.
Specifies the tip for container.
The vertical alignment for component.
Indicates the expansion for component.
Indicates the expansion for the last component added to the container.
The background color. A possible color from ColorConstants or a RGB value like: '150;230;23'.
Sets the animation enabled/disabled.
Specifies the default collapse/expand duration. By default 200 ms.
The opacity condition.
Fixes insets for component. Its structure must be 4 values for insets separated by ';'(top;left;bottom;right).
Associated entity.
Attribute for data component. It is the primary key for entity.
To establish a filter. It will be a constraint for all queries in entity.
Form associated to the table.
Name of the other fields that are parentkeys, that are passed to the detail form when it is open. These values will be get from the parent form, in which the Table is placed.

Allows the Table to have some control buttons, in the top of it. This buttons, by default, can export to excel the data in the table, show charts, reports, and so on. If the value is not, the controlsvisible attribute will not affect.
The field attribute.
The alignment for component.
Associated entity.
The Table key.
Attributes to fill after query operation.
Icon for query button.
The text for query button.
The parentkey or parentkeys to filter
Columns associated to the code. It forms the description field.
The form that is opened in detail. On init, update mode will be its state.
The other keys.

Allows the Table to have some control buttons, in the top of it. This buttons, by default, can export to excel the data in the table, show charts, reports, and so on. If the value is not, the controlsvisible attribute will not affect.
The maximum number of characters supported for introducing.
Shows the characters always in uppercase.
Complete path to .xml form definition.
Indicates whether a dialog box with a calendar will be showed.
Indicates the form to notify the change event in calendar values. By default, its value is 'no' and so, the changes are only showed when you abandon the calendar.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Indicates the path to icon that shows the calendar. By default, ImageManager.CALENDAR.
Attribute for field.
Complete path to html template.
Specifies whether the component must use an scroll or not.
Adjust the component to use vertical scroll.
Adjust the component to use horizontal scroll.
Fixes specified paint for viewer.
Maximum width for component. It will be scrollable when reaches this value.
The opacity condition for component. By default, true.

The returned type: stringrgb': Returns a string in decimal format rrr;ggg;bbb (no necessary always 10 characters), 'stringhex': Returns a string in hexadecimal format #RRGGBB, 'number': Returns a Number object. Its value will be R*Math.exp(256, 2) + G*256 + B, 'integer': Returns an integer object. Its value will be RBG
Condition to show the text field.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Condition to activate the text field.
Condition to show the delete button.
Width in pixels of color bar showed in this field.
Height in pixels of color bar showed in this field.
Indicates the visibility condition of date field and calendar button. By default, no
The date for the field will be fixed by this attribute. Creates a dependence with other date field.
Indicates whether a calculator is showed in the field.
The minimum number of digits.
The maximum number of digits.
Indicates when field value is returned like a string. It could be used to fill with zeros.
Indicates whether the field is showed whitout point separator. For example, 1000 or 1.000 . It is not valid with advancedquerymode.
The presence of the calendar.
The minimum number of digits.
The maximum number of digits.
The minimum number of decimal digits.
The maximum number of decimal digits.
The condition to put the numbers in groups (1 000 000 -> 1000000).

* : any character # : alphabetical character (capital letter or lower case letter) A : alphabetical character (capital letter) a : alphabetical character (lower case letter) % : alphanumeric character .
With 'yes' value indicates that field must be filled completely, otherwise, the field value will be considered null although it contains any data.
Name of the entity related to the Table.
The names of the columns that this table will query and handle.
Name of the entity primary keys.
The border for component. It is also allowed or a color defined in ColorConstants. Moreover, it is also allowed a border defined in BorderManager.
Foreing key column names.
Name of the form that will be open to show the Table information. By default, this form will be open by double-clicking a record of the Table or when pressing the Table insert button.

Allows the Table to have some control buttons, in the top of it. This buttons, by default, can export to excel the data in the table, show charts, reports, and so on. If the value is not, the controlsvisible attribute will not affect.
Establishes a correspondence between a table column and a field in detail form. They are represented by pairs, all separated by ';'
Defines a new type of table: a dynamic table where columns are inferred from values, not defined in xml.
Defines whether columns in table header are translated. By default, if table is 'dynamic' fixes translateheader='no', in other case always is translated.
Defines the table as a autoinsertable table. The last row in this table allows to insert records directly into database.
Sets the printing font size. The values can be from 1 up to 7 (more is bigger).
This attribute specifies the columns that will be renderer as a currency, using a renderer to do that.
Activates the functionallity of deleting records directly from the Table, instead using the detail form to do that.
Add the refreshbutton to the table to allow the user to refresh the Table.
The default columns that will be show in the Table.

The value is a string with the name of the new column and the math expression that will be used in each column. With this, the Table will have new columns calculated on the client side according to the expression. For example calculedcols=total;number*units. This will create a new column named total which value will be the multiplication of number and units.
Default width for the table header.
Shows or hide a column containing the row numumber.
Number of columns to query when the table is pageable. Only under certain databases.
name of the class which provides the form dynamc names. The contructor withuot parameter will be used to do so. No one set by default.

If the Table has detail form, with this parameter, when the detail form is open, the Table will pass the field values of the parent form (this is, the form in which the table is placed) to the detail form, to fiz them, not allowing them to be modified.
Name of the Entity related to the Table. In this case the entity is a local one, stored un the client memory, to perform local operations that do not need a database interaction.
Allows the Table to have a horizontal scroll. This is useful in Table with several columns to display and there is no room enough for all of them.
Determines the columns that will have a time render.
Selects the columns to add a RenderMemo, this is, the columns that stores long texts.
Columns that can be edited directly within the Table. By default, the database will not be updated. This can be used with a Editor to update the record.
Columns that will update the changes in the database when the user change the values stored in those.
Shows the table controls. See the controls attribute.

Activates the functionallity of inserting records directly from the Table using the detail form to do that. Is is set to yes no records can be inserted using this table amd the button to that, a small one in a top-right corner od the Table will be deactivated.
Activates a Table default functionality tha can represent the Table information using graphical charts.
Allows the TableHeader to adjunts its height to the FontText in order to see the the text when the font size changes.
The columns that will be visible in the Table by default. The columns in the cols attribute can be shown or hidden in runtime.
Required columns in the table for the calculed colums. When these required columns has a null value, the calculed colum involving it will show a null value as well.

Activates the functionality to open the detail form in a new window. See the defaultnewwindow attribute. This option can be set to the whole application by setting the Table variable SHOW_OPEN_IN_NEW_WINDOW_MENU.

If the table has a detail form set, with this then in which the window will be open can be controled. There are two ways of opening a new window: as a dialog that blocks the applicacion in backgroung (default), or as a window itself. With this the default behaviour can be change. Pressing the 'Shift' while opening the window the non-default behaviour will be chosen. If the attribute opennewwindow is set, will not be applied.
Vertical scroll for Table component. By default, 'yes'.
Width for vertical scroll. By default, '20'.
Show grid lines in table. By default, 'yes'.
Sets the minimum row height. By default, Table.MIN_ROW_HEIGHT.
Parameter to set all the components in the table opaque or not.
Columns to sum at the botton of the Table, in a new row.
Shows or hide the quick filter component.
Allows the quick filter functionality.
Allows the pivot functionality, to work with the information in the Table
Name of the Entity related to the Table. In this case the entity is a local one, stored un the client memory, to perform local operations that do not need a database interaction.
Columns showed in report dialog. By default 'visiblecols'.
Only for autoinsertable tables (insertable='yes'). Required cols in autoinsertable table.
Only for autoinsertable tables (insertable='yes'). Columns of table that are insertables. By default, all columns.
Only for autoinsertable tables (insertable='yes'). Indicates whether insert operations are executed directly in database.
Indicates whether remove operations are executed directly in database.
Indicates whether the row at bottom to show total operation results is showed.
Defines whether table buttons have border or not.
Defines whether table buttons are opaque or not.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
Path to this Table icon.
The height for header.
Font for header text. It is accepted a string like : 'Arial-BOLD-18'. Similar to Font.decode
Color for foreground in header.
Color for background in header.
Color of shadow for font.
Path to background image.
Path to background image when the column is grouped.
Border of header.
Border of header.
Border for last column in header.
Border for first column in header.
Font for quickfilter text.
Color for quickfilter font.
Specific border for quickfilter.
Font for message showed when user does not type any value to search.
Definition of columns and associated renderers (col1:renderer1;col2:renderer2;...;coln:renderern). Renderer identifiers are defined in external file.
Definition of columns and associated editors (col1:editor1;col2:editor2;...;coln:editorn). Editor identifiers are defined in external file.
Defines whether table can insert in insert mode
The attribute for tab panel.
Initial text is shown in button, before locale is established. By default, an empty string.
The button alignment.
Icon for button.
The reference to the button. It is used by form to return a button reference, so it must be unique in a FORM.
The key used by bundle to translation. So, It must be present in bundle file.
The size of label.
The font size.
The font color.
The condition to use bold font.
The border definition style.
Alignment for icon with respect to the text. Only important when icon and text are both presents.
The mnemonic for button.
The path for icon when button is disabled.
The roll-over condition.
Preferred height in pixels for button.
The text alignment.
Auxiliary icon when setAltMode is enabled.
Auxiliary text when setAltMode is enabled..
TAuxiliary tip when setAltMode is enabled.
The opacity condition for button. By default, 'yes'.
Visibility of button border. By default, 'yes'.
The font for button. It is allowed a String similar to: 'Arial-BOLD-18'.
Sets the focus paint property. See setFocusPainted(boolean) in AbstractButton.

'yes': i.e. if 'button_name' is the name of button icon, it is mandatory that exists a button called 'button_name_pressed' that will be showed when it is pressed. The other possibility is fix in parameter directly the path to the icon to show.
Sets the highlight property when mouse is entered (See AbstractButton - setContentAreaFilled(boolean)). This parameter requires opaque='no'.
By default ('yes'), combo contains an empty value in first position of deployed list. With this parameter is possible to delete this value and show only field values.
List of values for list, separated by ';'
Indicates whether translations are looked for the resource file.

The URI where there is an equivalence file for combo values. For example, in database student califications are stored like 1,2,3,4 but it is wanted a most representative values, so it could be defined a equivalence properties like: 1 = worst 2 = regular 3 = good 4 = great
Indicates whether field support the edition in combo values.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Associated entity.
The code name associated to field.
The number of characters for code field.
Condition about visibility of cod.
Columns associated to the code. It forms the description field.
The time data remains in cache.
When code value is an Integer.
The separator character for columns.

The field that is parentkey and correspondent associated field in entity (fieldpk1:fieldentitypk1;fieldpk2:fieldentitypk2;...fieldpkn:fieldentitypkn). It is accepted to indicate only the fieldpki when it is equal to fieldentitypki, e.g. : fieldpk1;fieldpk2:fieldentitypk2;...fieldpkn:fieldentitypkn
Field is reset when one of fields that are parentkey changes.
Disable field when parentkey is null.
With 'no' parameter, field will have its own cache.
The condition to init cache on set value
The visible cols from cols. With empty parameter all columns are visible.
The form that is opened in detail. On init, update mode will be its state.
Field attributes whose value will be set when combo data change.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.

(message;column_1;...;column_N)The field shows the translation with the given message and columns. Example: User has a reference combo field that queries an entity with three fields ID;INITIALDATE;ENDDATE. ID is the code of field. User wants to format description of this field to show: Period starts: INITIALDATE and ends: ENDDATE. He only needs to store in bundle a key, e.g., refComboKey= Period starts: {0} and ends: {1}.He must specify in parameter format='refComboKey;INITIALDATE;ENDDATE'
Java Date pattern to use in format parameter.
The image location.
Character to show in field
Indicates whether field value will be the encrypted or not.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Indicates whether getValue() returns a boolean. By default, returns an Integer.
Indicates whether returns the value in String format.(S->True, N->False).
Optional path to icon used when check is selected.
Optional path to icon used when check is deselected.
no -> Varchar ; yes -> LongVarchar.
The uppercase condition.
The maxlength for component.
The number of rows.
The vertical expansion.
The preferred column width in pixels. Useful for specifying empty columns.
The preferred field height in pixels. Useful for specifying empty columns.
The position of buttons. With 'no' buttons will not be showed.
The relative path from classpath to load the empty image.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Associated entity.
The code name associated to field.
When code value is an Integer.
The number of characters for code field.
Condition about visibility of cod.
Specifies an input mask for applying to the code field.
Visible table columns in text field. By default, it is the parameter value of visiblecols in table.
The Table key.
Disable field when parentkey is null.
Field is reset when one of fields that are parentkey changes.
Columns associated to the code. It forms the description field.
The visible cols from cols. With empty parameter all columns are visible.
The form that is opened in detail. On init, update mode will be its state.

The field that is parentkey and correspondent associated field in entity (fieldpk1:fieldentitypk1;fieldpk2:fieldentitypk2;...fieldpkn:fieldentitypkn). It is accepted to indicate only the fieldpki when it is equal to fieldentitypki, e.g. : fieldpk1;fieldpk2:fieldentitypk2;...fieldpkn:fieldentitypkn

Allows the Table to have some control buttons, in the top of it. This buttons, by default, can export to excel the data in the table, show charts, reports, and so on. If the value is not, the controlsvisible attribute will not affect.
The time data remains in cache.
The separator character for columns.
With 'no' parameter, field will have its own cache.
Inits cache when setValue() is called.
The opacity condition for buttons. By default, opaque=yes
Defines border of buttons.
Defines whether buttons are highlighted when mouse is entered over them.
Field attributes whose value will be set when combo data change.
Condition about visibility of cod search in detail window.
It specifies the field name for searching when user introduces a search value.

(message;column_1;...;column_N)The field shows the translation with the given message and columns. Example: User has a reference combo field that queries an entity with three fields ID;INITIALDATE;ENDDATE. ID is the code of field. User wants to format description of this field to show: Period starts: INITIALDATE and ends: ENDDATE. He only needs to store in bundle a key, e.g., refComboKey= Period starts: {0} and ends: {1}.He must specify in parameter format='refComboKey;INITIALDATE;ENDDATE'
Java Date pattern to use in format parameter.
Attribute for component.
Initial status for component.
Xaxis position in pixels.
Yaxis position in pixels.
Image for ON status.
Image for OFF status.
Image for ALARM status.
Image when component is disabled
Rotates 90 degrees when is enabled.
Blinking image when alarm state is enabled.
Width for image.
Height for image.
Position relative for label respect the text.
The text for component
The font size.
The font color.
Name of entity where data are received.
Attribute for field.
Xaxis label.
Yaxis name or names (separated by ';'). Even the number of ocurrences could be showed with '$Count$' identifier.
Types of charts: line, bar, bar3d, pie, pie3d, stacked3d.
Xaxis label.
Yaxis label.
Preferred size for width.
Preferred size for width.
The attribute for component.
Associated file. The extension file must be .htm or html.
The initial selection for radio buttons.
By default ('no') this component always tries to select one component placed inside. With this parameter is allowed null selection (a non-visible radio button is selected).
The standard buttons definition. For example: 'qui' -> only query,update and insert buttons will be showed.
Creates a separator for this component.
default/none/raised/lowered or a color defined in ColorConstants. Moreover, it is also allowed a border defined in BorderManager
Data field opacity condition for Form buttons
Sets the highlight in button property when mouse is entered. See AbstractButton-setContentAreaFilled(boolean)). This parameter requires opaque='no'
The specification for margin (top;left;bottom;right), for example (3;3;3;3)
The keys for field.
The text showed in each option.

The icon showed for each text. If texts and icons are both presents should have the same size and it is possible to complete with Null values to indicate empty value. For example: texts=query;delete;null;close icons=null;icons/delete.gif;null;icons/close.gif
The attribute to manage the splitpane.
The orientation for component.
The background color. A possible color for {@link ColorConstants} or a RGB value like: '150;230;23'.
The opaque condition for splitpane
The size of the split panel divider
The attribute to manage the separator.
The key for button tip.
The URL for icon button.
The attribute. It is required and it is established like actionCommand of button.
The tip key of button.
URI for icon button.
The attribute for component.
Separator width in pixels.
The fields to calculate the field value.
The mathematical expression to define the field value.
The required fields. When a required field is not present, the final value for calculated data field is not showed.
To support the change in the currency value.
The presence of the calendar.
The minimum number of integer digits.
The maximum number of integer digits.
The minimum number of decimal digits.
The maximum number of decimal digits.
The maximum number of decimal digits.
The condition to put the numbers in groups (1 000 000 -> 1000000)
Fields used to calculate this field.
The mathematical expression to use for field.
The required fields to obtain the calculated field. When a required field from list is not present, the calculated field will be empty.
The color for separator.
The attribute for field
Path for icon
The label text
The alignment
The vertical alignment
The label size
The font size
The font color
Font for data field. It is accepted a string like : 'Arial-BOLD-18'. Similar to Font.decode
The bold capitalization condition
The resize posibilities (no resize, resize the insertion space, resize the space between label and text).
The number of showed rows. By default, 5.
Indicates whether field will be expanded vertically to use all space in parent container.
The source table.
The destination table.
The name of table for button.
The message to show when no results after refreshing. By default, no message.
Indicates whether table auto adjust the columns after refreshing.
The initial selection for radio buttons.
By default ('no') this component always tries to select one component placed inside. With this parameter is allowed null selection (a non-visible radio button is selected).
Name of form manager responsible of the form creation.
Form name. Keys are needed in form.
The title of form.
The equivalences between navigation form fields and the form where component is placed. The format must be: nav1=val1 nav2=val2
The attribute for component.
The attribute for component.
The attribute for component.
The text when data is empty.
Nombre de clase completo que implementa FocusListener y se registrar como escuchador del componente de texto que contiene los datos del campo. Debe tener un constructor sin parametros.
The attribute values.
Indicates the type of separator.
Indicates whether returned value by getValue() is a boolean.
Indicates whether returned value by getValue() is a combo selectable option. This parameter has more priority than returnboolean.
Text will be showed with true value.
Text will be showed with false value.
Indicates whether texts for true and false value will be translated. For a correct translation, texts should not have spaces.
Color for false value.
Color for true value.
The number of rows showed. By default, 8.
Associated entity.
Name of the table primary key
Data field attributes separated by ';'. This fields will be filled with the query result.
Field attributes used in the query to show the table.
Field attributes (separated by ';'), which are specified in 'search' and are necessary to make the query of data that will be shown in the table.It allows to force to intoduce search criterion.
Specifies if it automatically includes an * at the end of the string value when it searches for the query attributes

Property.decription: Field attributes (subset as 'source') to listen for the button. If some of this fields changes the record select window will be shown.

Property.description: The list of data components attributes to form the component.
The attribute name.
Entity name to attach the file. Usually the same as the form entity.
Parameter to indicate if the form refresh the values.

Parameter to indicate if the attachment process is synchronized or not. If it is a synchronized process a progress window appears during the attachment process and blocks the application until the attachment finishes. In a not synchronized process more than one file can be attached at the same time.
URI to a sound file that will be reproduced when the attachment process finishes.
Entity name to get the file. Usually the same as the form entity.
Parameter to indicate the file will be open when the process finishes file.
Data field attribute which is used as suggestion for the name to save.

Parameter to indicate if the process is synchronized or not. If it is a synchronized process a progress window appears during the process and blocks the application until the download finishes. In a not synchronized process more than one file can be downloaded at the same time.
URI to a sound file that will be reproduced when the process finishes.
Parameter to indicate if a message will be shown to open the file.
If open=yes and wait=yes and tempfile=yes a temporal file will be created. In this way user has not to select the file name and location.
The list of data components attributes to form the component.
Indicates whether the scroll component is opaque. By default, yes.
The preferred size for the Scroll component. Format width;height
The border type. They are allowed line borders with color defined in ColorConstants and borders registered in BorderManager.

Name of the data entity.This entity must implement PrintDataEntity. The data request send a hashtable object with the values of the form keys in the request moment. It is possible select the values to send as keys in the 'keys' parameter and which of this values are mandatory in the 'required' parameter.
XML description file path. This is a relative path, i.e. com/ontimize/reports/report.xml.
Parameter to indicate if a report preview is shown before printing the report.
Form data fields to use in the report data query.
Subset of values specified by the 'keys' parameter. These values are necessary to be able to generate the report.
The maximum value for slider.
The minimum value for slider.
Indicates whether labels and separators are used.
Indicates the orientation slider.
The scale for internal component value.
The attribute.
The grid margin.
The number of columns.
The number of rows.
The horizontal gap.
The vertical gap.
The title. If title exists, border will not exist.
Indicates the name of the entity to use in the query.
Indicates the function to execute in the query.
Indicates the name of the column to apply the function.Example max(functioncolumn)
Indicates the list of columns to query.
Indicates the list of columns to use as filter in the query.

Indicates the field data type (function result).If type=number it is possible to use RealDataField parameters to configure the number format.These parameters are: minintegerdigits,maxintegerdigits,mindecimaldigits ,maxdecimaldigits,grouping
Pattern to use for dates when type=date.
Indicates if it is necessary to use NullValue in the query filter if some of the filter column values are null
Indicates if it is necessary to use the form entity key as a filter column in the query
Component attribute to retrieve from the form.
Internal DMS Document entity to fill component in query mode.
The root branch name of the repository tree.
Form fields values to calculate the keys node.
Filter the query with the form fields values.

When disabled, user can't change the current content view, disabling all operations in the component that can change the file contents or structure. By default, component opens all files in a read only directory.
Fix the component height.
Fix the component width.
The label text
The visibility condition.
Component attribute to retrieve from the form.
Internal DMS Document entity to fill component in query mode.
The root branch name of the repository tree.
Form fields values to calculate the keys node.
Filter the query with the form fields values.
Allows to filter query. Default values: file;link. Other values: base;keys;dir.
Query documents in all levels.
The label text
The visibility condition.
